title: Rehabilitation Services | Advocate Lutheran General Hospital | Park Ridge, IL
description: Why are we recognized as a national leader in rehabilitation? We have CARF accreditation, excellent patient satisfaction ratings, and a robust rehabilitation program that includes many specialty therapies.
cleaned_text: Advocate Lutheran General Hospital is widely recognized as a regional leader in rehabilitation. Our [rehabilitation care unit](https://youtu.be/hN3Z51Lw5DY) provides a comprehensive scope of inpatient and outpatient services for people of all ages, from newborns to seniors. Each program features treatments and therapies tailored to the unique needs of patients. For cardiac rehabilitation, please visit the [Advocate Heart Institute](https://www.advocatehealth.com/health-services/advocate-heart-institute/cardiac-rehabilitation). Inpatient rehabilitation at Advocate Lutheran General is an intensive program provided by highly skilled and experienced professionals working closely with patients and families. Individualized patient-driven goals are established early in the program to maximize functional abilities. Our [CARF](http://www.carf.org/home/)-accredited rehabilitation care unit is part of a full-service hospital, and many of our staff members hold specialty certifications. We have earned excellent patient satisfaction ratings, and score high on other outcome measures including average length of stay and discharge destination. Services we provide include: Call [847-723-6690](tel:18477236690) to schedule an appointment for inpatient rehabilitation. Each interdisciplinary team offers a continuum of services with the goal of maximizing patients' function and independence so they can integrate back into home and community as quickly and successively as possible. Many of our therapists have training in specialty techniques relating to the care of patients with brain injury, stroke, spinal cord injury, amputations, cancer and orthopedic and neurologic condition. The resource center features a computer with links to resources, brochures and resource books. We can give you the expert care you deserve. We offer a full range of diagnostic and therapy services, including several state-of-the-art specialty programs, provided by a highly trained team of professionals. Patients are provided one-on-one care, including individualized treatment programs with the goal of returning to optimal health. For pediatric rehabilitation, please visit [Advocate Children's Hospitals' pediatric therapy](https://www.advocatechildrenshospital.com/services/physical-occupational-and-speech-therapies/physical-therapy). Outpatient rehabilitation services - including occupational, physical, and speech therapy - are available at multiple Advocate Lutheran General outpatient rehabilitation facilities.
